long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Introducing the Text-to-Speech Audio Extension!

Support for speech synthesis across languages. For English, it supports variants like British English, American English, Australian English, and Canadian English accents. For Chinese, it covers Mainland Chinese Mandarin and Taiwanese Mandarin.

Other major languages backed include Japanese, French, German, European and Latin American Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Korean, Hindi, and Arabic. The text-to-speech technology enables fluent reading of text across these different languages, accounting for variation in accents as well.

This handy browser extension allows you to convert any text on a webpage into natural sounding audio with just a click.

To use it, simply highlight the text you want to convert, right click, and select "Speak Text". The extension will instantly read the selected text aloud using state-of-the-art text-to-speech technology.

Customize the way your audio sounds by adjusting the rate and pitch sliders in the extension popup. Speed up or slow down the narration, and change the tone to your liking.

Once generated, you can listen to the audio directly in your browser, or download it as an MP3 file. The audio downloads are yours to keep and use anywhere!

With this text-to-speech extension, you can:

Convert articles, stories, or any web text into audio
Listen to content instead of reading - great for multitasking!
Create audio versions of text to listen on the go
Download personalized audio files to your device
Customize rate, pitch, voices and more through the extension
Why use Text-to-Speech Audio Extension?

Reads text aloud for you, saving you time
Makes web content more accessible
Helps you retain and comprehend information better
Great for listening to content while driving, exercising, cooking, etc.
Useful aid for those with reading challenges or visual impairments
Install the Text-to-Speech Audio Extension now to start converting text into natural audio!
